title: Plane Rend
data:
***Version [0.28](/0.28 "0.28")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

|   |                                                                                                                                                                                                               |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | Summons some of the greater threats from one of the Pits of Slime, the Elven Halls, the Vaults, the Crypt, the Tomb of Ancients, or the Realm of Zot; the specific branch varies with each cast of the spell. |

**Plane Rend** is a monster-only spell which summons 1-3 monsters from one of the following randomly selected [branches](/Branch "Branch"), with each branch being of equal likelihood. Its summon cap is 6.

| Branch                                           | Monster, chance in branch cast[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)                                                                                                           |        |                                                                                                                                                                                 |        |                                                                                                                                                                                       |        |
| ------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------ |
| The [Slime Pits](/Slime_Pits "Slime Pits")       | J [![Rockslime.png](/images/6/6d/Rockslime.png)](/File:Rockslime.png) **[Rockslime](/Rockslime "Rockslime")**                                                 | 35.71% | J [![Acid blob.png](/images/2/2c/Acid_blob.png)](/File:Acid_blob.png) **[Acid blob](/Acid_blob "Acid blob")**                                                                   | 35.71% | J [![Slime creature5.png](/images/0/07/Slime_creature5.png)](/File:Slime_creature5.png) **Titanic [slime creature](/Slime_creature "Slime creature")**                                | 28.51% |
| The [Elven Halls](/Elven_Halls "Elven Halls")    | e [![Deep elf sorcerer.png](/images/2/2b/Deep_elf_sorcerer.png)](/File:Deep_elf_sorcerer.png) **[Deep elf sorcerer](/Deep_elf_sorcerer "Deep elf sorcerer")** | 38.46% | e [![Deep elf high priest.png](/images/c/cc/Deep_elf_high_priest.png)](/File:Deep_elf_high_priest.png) **[Deep elf high priest](/Deep_elf_high_priest "Deep elf high priest")** | 38.46% | e [![Deep elf blademaster.png](/images/9/9b/Deep_elf_blademaster.png)](/File:Deep_elf_blademaster.png) **[Deep elf blademaster](/Deep_elf_blademaster "Deep elf blademaster")**       | 23.08% |
| The [Vaults](/Vaults "Vaults")                   | 9 [![War gargoyle.png](/images/a/ae/War_gargoyle.png)](/File:War_gargoyle.png) **[War gargoyle](/War_gargoyle "War gargoyle")**                               | 45.45% | p [![Vault sentinel.png](/images/6/69/Vault_sentinel.png)](/File:Vault_sentinel.png) **[Vault sentinel](/Vault_sentinel "Vault sentinel")**                                     | 36.36% | p [![Ironbound convoker.png](/images/2/27/Ironbound_convoker.png)](/File:Ironbound_convoker.png) **[Ironbound convoker](/Ironbound_convoker "Ironbound convoker")**                   | 18.18% |
| The [Crypt](/Crypt "Crypt")                      | V [![Vampire knight.png](/images/b/be/Vampire_knight.png)](/File:Vampire_knight.png) **[Vampire knight](/Vampire_knight "Vampire knight")**                   | 35.71% | W [![Flayed ghost.png](/images/8/8b/Flayed_ghost.png)](/File:Flayed_ghost.png) **[Flayed ghost](/Flayed_ghost "Flayed ghost")**                                                 | 35.71% | z [![Revenant.png](/images/0/07/Revenant.png)](/File:Revenant.png) **[Revenant](/Revenant "Revenant")**                                                                               | 28.51% |
| The [Tomb](/Tomb "Tomb")                         | H [![Sphinx.png](/images/0/0e/Sphinx.png)](/File:Sphinx.png) **[Sphinx](/Sphinx "Sphinx")**                                                                   | 38.46% | M [![Mummy priest.png](/images/0/0f/Mummy_priest.png)](/File:Mummy_priest.png) **[Mummy priest](/Mummy_priest "Mummy priest")**                                                 | 38.46% | z [![Ancient champion.png](/images/8/81/Ancient_champion.png)](/File:Ancient_champion.png) **[Ancient champion](/Ancient_champion "Ancient champion")**                               | 23.08% |
| The [Abyss](/Abyss "Abyss")                      | X [![Starcursed mass.png](/images/5/5b/Starcursed_mass.png)](/File:Starcursed_mass.png) **[Starcursed mass](/Starcursed_mass "Starcursed mass")**             | 45.45% | t [![Apocalypse crab.png](/images/8/88/Apocalypse_crab.png)](/File:Apocalypse_crab.png) **[Apocalypse crab](/Apocalypse_crab "Apocalypse crab")**                               | 36.36% | X [![Tentacled starspawn.png](/images/2/25/Tentacled_starspawn.png)](/File:Tentacled_starspawn.png) **[Tentacled starspawn](/Tentacled_starspawn "Tentacled starspawn")**             | 18.18% |
| The [Realm of Zot](/Realm_of_Zot "Realm of Zot") | D [![Golden dragon.png](/images/3/36/Golden_dragon.png)](/File:Golden_dragon.png) **[Golden dragon](/Golden_dragon "Golden dragon")**                         | 45.45% | y [![Moth of wrath.png](/images/9/94/Moth_of_wrath.png)](/File:Moth_of_wrath.png) **[Moth of wrath](/Moth_of_wrath "Moth of wrath")**                                           | 36.36% | q [![Draconian stormcaller.png](/images/2/28/Draconian_stormcaller.png)](/File:Draconian_stormcaller.png) **[Draconian stormcaller](/Draconian_stormcaller "Draconian stormcaller")** | 18.18% |

The following enemies cast Plane Rend:

- 6 [![Demonspawn corrupter.png](/images/1/10/Demonspawn_corrupter.png)](/File:Demonspawn_corrupter.png) **[Demonspawn corrupter](/Demonspawn_corrupter "Demonspawn corrupter")**

## History

- In [0.32](/0.32 "0.32"), the spell will summon [ironbound thunderhulks](/Ironbound_thunderhulk "Ironbound thunderhulk") instead of vault sentinels.
- The monster set has been modified in [0.15](/0.15 "0.15"), [0.16](/0.16 "0.16"), [0.19](/0.19 "0.19"), and [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"). It lost [Lair](/Lair "Lair") and [Orc](/Orc "Orc") representation in a previous version, then lost [Snake](/Snake "Snake"), [Swamp](/Swamp "Swamp"), [Shoals](/Shoals "Shoals"), and [Spider](/Spider "Spider") representation in 0.28.
- Plane Rend was added in [0.14](/0.14 "0.14").

## References

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [mon-cast.cc:4822](https://github.com/crawl/crawl/blob/0.28.0/crawl-ref/source/mon-cast.cc#L4822) (0.28.0)
html:
Plane Rend

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.28: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.
Summons some of the greater threats from one of the Pits of Slime, the Elven Halls, the Vaults, the Crypt, the Tomb of Ancients, or the Realm of Zot; the specific branch varies with each cast of the spell.

Plane Rend is a monster-only spell which summons 1-3 monsters from one of the following randomly selected branches, with each branch being of equal likelihood. Its summon cap is 6.

Branch Monster, chance in branch cast[1]
The Slime Pits J Rockslime 35.71% J Acid blob 35.71% J Titanic slime creature 28.51%
The Elven Halls e Deep elf sorcerer 38.46% e Deep elf high priest 38.46% e Deep elf blademaster 23.08%
The Vaults 9 War gargoyle 45.45% p Vault sentinel 36.36% p Ironbound convoker 18.18%
The Crypt V Vampire knight 35.71% W Flayed ghost 35.71% z Revenant 28.51%
The Tomb H Sphinx 38.46% M Mummy priest 38.46% z Ancient champion 23.08%
The Abyss X Starcursed mass 45.45% t Apocalypse crab 36.36% X Tentacled starspawn 18.18%
The Realm of Zot D Golden dragon 45.45% y Moth of wrath 36.36% q Draconian stormcaller 18.18%

The following enemies cast Plane Rend:

  • 6 Demonspawn corrupter

History

  • In 0.32, the spell will summon ironbound thunderhulks instead of vault sentinels.
  • The monster set has been modified in 0.15, 0.16, 0.19, and 0.28. It lost Lair and Orc representation in a previous version, then lost Snake, Swamp, Shoals, and Spider representation in 0.28.
  • Plane Rend was added in 0.14.

References

  1. ↑ mon-cast.cc:4822 (0.28.0)
